MESSAGE: Well, hello there. I'm the Gunslinger, and this is what I like to call "Dodge the Slimes!"
So there's this nasty sorcerer who means to destroy the great town of Liberty. He must be stopped!
He's made the skies rain slimes from above! We gotta dodge as many as we can, cuz' we're Liberty's only hope!
So let's get to it, partner!
We did our best, but it wasn't enough. That's a pretty good time, though. Better luck next time!
